articles.title: From terminal to cancer-free: Minneapolis woman 2nd to have novel surgery - KSTP
articles.description: A former Minneapolis nurse who was told she had just months to live heard the best possible words from a surgeon in Chicago: "I can make you cancer free."
articles.content:
A retired Minneapolis nurse given a prognosis that she had just months to live became cancer-free within that same time frame thanks to a first-of-its-kind procedure.
